Licking: {sub} plays with the tip of {dom}'s {genital} for 15 seconds.
{sub} must lick {genital|other} as many times as possible before their next turn.
{dom} has every oral giver/switch lick their {genital}.
Oral (Penetrative): {sub} holds {dom}'s {genital} in their mouth until {sub}'s next turn.
{sub} gives oral to {dom} between short breaths. x10. | Down, Up, Breathe. Repeat.
{sub} puts on a show giving oral to {dom}.
{sub} flicks the tip of {dom}'s {genital} with their tongue during oral.
{sub} focuses on the tip of {dom}'s {genital} for 30 seconds.
{sub} gives oral to each player before their next turn.
{dom} thrusts into each player's mouth for 30 seconds.
{sub} must give oral to as many players as possible before their next turn.
{dom} has every oral giver/switch give them oral one at a time.
{dom} has every oral giver/switch pleasure their {genital} simultaneously.
Penetrative Oral: {sub} pleasures {dom} with deep oral for 5 seconds.
{sub} takes {dom} deep between breaths. x10. | Down, Up, Breathe. Repeat.
{sub} takes each player deep once for as long as possible.
{sub} must take as many players as possible deep before their next turn.
{dom} has every oral giver/switch take them deep.
Penetrative Breath Play: {sub} takes {dom} as deep as possible for as long as they can.
{sub} takes {dom} deep at least 4 times for as long as possible.
{sub} must take each player deep for as long as possible.
{dom} has every oral giver/switch compete for who can take them deepest the longest. Max of 60 seconds.
